```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}

bkt = read.csv(here("data", "Brook_Trout_Hg.csv"))


plot(Hg ~ Growth_Rate, data = bkt)
boxplot(Hg ~ Temperature, data = bkt)


fit_temp = lm(Hg ~ Temperature, data=bkt)
  anova(fit_temp)
  
  
fit_growth = lm(Hg ~ Growth_Rate, data=bkt)
  anova(fit_growth)

  
fit_both = lm(formula = Hg ~ Growth_Rate * Temperature, data = bkt)
    anova(fit_both)
    
    
fit_cort = lm(formula = Hg ~ cort, data = bkt)
    anova(fit_cort)

fit_hsp = lm(formula = Hg ~ hsp, data = bkt)
    anova(fit_hsp)
    
    
fit_atp = lm(formula = Hg ~ atp, data = bkt)
    anova(fit_atp)
    
    
fit_hct = lm(formula = Hg ~ hct, data = bkt)
    anova(fit_hct)
    
```
